page.description: Moves the focus down, as if the user pressed the "Down" cursor key.
page.original:
&ltOBJECT>.DOWN() Syntax &ltOBJECT>.DOWN() Description The &ltOBJECT>.DOWN() method applies to:
Browses (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltBROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltFORM> pointer or the name of the form) The &ltOBJECT>.DOWN() method moves the focus down as if the user had pressed the Down key. Limitations Desktop applications only. Example This script moves to the next field on the form: parentform.down()
See Also Form Functions and Methods, Browse Functions and Methods
